TopicTitle: Game crashed on revert to SPH

Articles.Content:
[accidentally made duplicate post, please delete]

Game Version: 1.0.2

OS: Windows 7 Enterprise 64 bit

Game is running through Steam

Files saved on Google Drive:

[Crash Report](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B_mL6Ehu8rS2b0FkRXRmMk50NG8/view?usp=sharing) (rar file)

[dxdiag.txt](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B_mL6Ehu8rS2NHYxUXBmZ1dVbHM/view?usp=sharing)

[Craft](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0B_mL6Ehu8rS2ckVLaU1id1BCams/view?usp=sharing)

My game crashed after I tested out a simple airplane. I launched the plane directly from the runway as soon as I started the game. After flying over to the island runway (and landing almost successfully), I reverted to launch. I realized I didn't want to launch again, so I reverted to the SPH. I saw my plane for a second in the SPH, and then the game immediately crashed. That's about it.

I don't have any mods at this time.
